attributes.additional_details: The government need to ban the sale of rawhide full stop. Somthing so deadly should not be sold to innocent pet owners uneducated on the dangers. Multi million pound companies like pets at home who claim to be animal lovers and enthusiasts should not be selling somthing that has murdered innocent animals and devastated the lives of their owners. The government and multi million £ companies need to start taking responsibility for the products they sell and the devestating effects it has.
attributes.background: Rawhide is a product that should never have been invented never mind sold as safe for dog consumption. Rawhide has killed hundreds of dogs & left owners in termoil and financial struggles after their pet has required emergancy surgery.
